message: UX folks, introduce yourself. I'm Jayson, you can find me at jaysonelliot.com - I run UX for G2.com
Question: what was/is your intention and/or hopes for this particular group!
Oh wait, this isn't the group I made, that was called UI/UX. That's why I suggested in Feedback to make it possible to merge groups with the consent of the two group creators to be merged. Phew.
For people to discuss UI/UX, ask questions and advice. I assume @jayson wants to do a little networking in the Introductions topic?
Spencer - is there a way to merge groups? It would be best to do one dedicated to UX rather than split the discussion.
This seemed like a better place for quick conversations, especially during the day at work.
My intention / hopes - I belong to a couple listservs and other types of groups, such as the IxDA and SIG-IA mailing lists, but they get unweildy and fill up my email quickly.
@jayson I suggested that feature in feedback a couple days ago. Hopefully it'll happen over time :-)
